content.rendered:
In this day and age, digital marketing is critical for any business with an online presence, whether you’re a marketing professional looking to expand your repertoire with cutting-edge digital marketing techniques, a recent college grad trying to break into the highly competitive marketing world, or an entrepreneur seeking to spread the word about your new startup.

Cutting through the noise with effective marketing has never been harder. But learning to be a digitally savvy marketer has never been easier, thanks to the wealth of online courses on the subject (many of them free). With new channels and strategies emerging on what seems like a daily basis, it’s increasingly important for marketing professionals to keep up with the latest and greatest.

Thousands of Resources

Class Central has compiled thousands of free digital marketing courses created by top universities around the world. They will take you to the top of your game, covering everything from digital brand management to social media strategy, to marketing analytics, to creating viral content, and everything in between.

Note that while you may have to pay if you want a certificate, most of these courses can be audited for free — that is, you can access the learning content for free, and sometimes even graded assignments. If you’re new to MOOCs, you can learn more about them in Class Central’s Beginners’ Guide to Massive Open Online Courses.

If you want to earn a free certificate to verify your ability in digital marketing, do not hesitate to read our report 800 Free Digital Marketing Certificates and Badges. You can learn from companies like Google, Facebook, LinkedIn Learning, Twitter, Semrush and more.

And if you don’t find what you’re looking for here, have a look at our comprehensive collections with thousands of free resources:

  • Massive List of Thousands of Free Certificates and Badges
  • 1000+ Free Developer and IT Certifications
  • 600+ Free Google Certifications

Digital Marketing Online Courses

To make this collection easy to navigate, we’ve broken down the courses by topic. Click on a topic to skip to the corresponding section:

  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
  • Social Media Marketing
  • ​​Facebook Marketing
  • Instagram Marketing
  • YouTube Marketing
  • TikTok Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Content Marketing
  • Google Analytics
  • Public Relations
  • Branding
  • Business Analysis

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Online Courses

  • Introduction to Google SEO via Coursera
  • SEO Foundations via LinkedIn Learning
  • SEO TRAINING 2021: Complete SEO Course + WordPress SEO Yoast via Udemy
  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO) via Coursera
  • SEO Tutorials for Beginners: Learn Search Engine Optimization Step-By-Step via YouTube

  • Google SEO Fundamentals via Coursera
  • Keyword Research Tutorials For SEO via YouTube
  • SEO In 2021 via YouTube
  • Brand Marketing and SEO Tools using Wix via Coursera

More on Class Central: 250+ Search Engine Optimization (SEO) courses.

More on Class Central: 900+ Social Media Marketing courses.
